signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the limitations of user licenses when setting up their shared inboxes.
signals.context: Managing multiple shared inboxes with several support representatives.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a way to automate the assignment of emails to specific team members based on terminal-related keywords.
signals.context: Handling emails related to different terminals, requiring specific assignments.

signals.problem_statement: The customer wants to ensure that follow-up emails are sent automatically for unresolved issues after a certain period.
signals.context: Managing customer inquiries that may require follow-ups.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for a way to categorize emails based on sentiment and urgency using AI.
signals.context: Desiring to improve email management efficiency through AI capabilities.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unsure about the integration of chat functionality and its implementation on their website.
signals.context: Exploring the setup of chat alongside email management.
